circle_bundles
  • API Reference
  • Result objects and dataclasses
  • View page source

Result objects and dataclasses

Most computations return small, stable dataclass containers. These are designed to be user-facing, pickle-friendly, and resilient to refactors of internal implementations.

Core result containers

circle_bundles.LocalTrivAndCocycle

Return container for Bundle.get_local_trivs().

circle_bundles.ClassesAndPersistence

Return container for Bundle.get_classes().

circle_bundles.BundleMapResult

Minimal, user-facing bundle-map output.

Lower-level results (stable)

circle_bundles.LocalTrivResult

Result container for local trivialization (circle-coordinate) computations.

circle_bundles.O2Cocycle

An estimated O(2)-valued 1-cochain (typically a cocycle) on a cover nerve.

circle_bundles.TransitionReport

Summary statistics and diagnostics for transition estimation.

circle_bundles.BundleQualityReport

Summary of diagnostic and quality metrics for a reconstructed bundle.

circle_bundles.PersistenceResult

Output of edge-driven persistence computations for characteristic classes.

circle_bundles.CobirthResult

Cobirth event for an edge-driven filtration.

circle_bundles.CodeathResult

Codeath event for an edge-driven filtration.
